long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can quickly google search the selected text.
Specifically, a button appears near the selected text, and clicking the button will perform a google search for the selected text.
In addition, the following three settings are available
- Icon position
You can customize the position of the button.
- Search word
You can customize the prefix and suffix of the text to be searched.
- Show Mode
You can select the search method. You can choose between tab and window.
